comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on September 22, 2023, 12:59:14 AMYoLooking to hire 6 forum posters immediately.Skype me to : live:.cid.4433a41dc76686feWould it not be better you state clearly the nature of the tasks you want to hire the 6 members for. You did not do a good introduction of your offer  coupled with the fact that you did not state your terms and conditions to apply in the course of application for your promotion here. You did not state the rank eligibility valid for application. I will advise you come down here to conclude everything about this deal for transparency and accountability so that there would be some level of trust and confidence when dealing.  Lastly, I would advise you opt for an escrow services here so that members would know you are serious about your job offer otherwise nobody would look your way.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: I suggest you to start a thread with all you requirements and what you want to promote. like here many campaign manager have done: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0You will see in the title "signature campaign".Forum members will automatically reply to your thread if they find your product which you want to promote is trusted, reputable, and you pay competitive payment/postand include your payment information or escrow link, because you are newbie here and cannot be trusted.you will find some trusted escrows here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: This offer looks more of a scam to me. OP has not been online since this thread was created and the account is over a year with no much activities.  I was thinking why OP would go for a Skype whereas the talks for the hire can continue here which would make it a little transparent and accountable. If OP feels he or she is too busy to give this platform attention OP could have contacted a campaign manager here for further discussions as to know what is obtainable to promote their products here. This act of OP cast more suspicion to the offer of a thing. This should be a warning to people contacting OP to be wary of scams and engagements that are not transparent with their offer such as this.
